title: ImportError libshm.so
body_html:
import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libshm.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

env:ubuntu 16.04,python2.7
So,what should I do?

body:
>>> import torch
